boardgame.name: Full Metal Planète
boardgame.description: In this game of science fiction strip mining, players land on a planet and try and grab as much ore as possible and take off before the game is over. Each player has tanks, boats, barges, mining equipment and a base ship at his disposal and will have to contend with the weather and the other miners. The game uses an action point allowance system and thus is dice free. Each player on his turn has a pool of points that he can divide in a variety of ways, putting all the points into one unit's movement or dividing them among several units. Each turn is timed so players have to think quickly, and once a move has been made it cannot be retracted. The game itself is beautifully put together, with a detailed hex grid and real metal miniatures for all of the units._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Online Play: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Full Metal Galaxy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Full Metal Program_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; VASSAL module_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Full Metal Conquête (as a two-player version)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expanded by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Full Metal Planete: Plateau Modulaire._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Microbadges:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; - Full Metal Plan_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;egrave;te fan Buy It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Game is complete - I just inventoried all the parts. Minor box scuffing around the edges. 1 slightly split corner. This is the jewel of my collection. German rulebook - English translation.
unplayed, some minor wear from storage on the box shipping: package by air mail

Very good condition, very minor _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039;age wear_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039; of box, but there are absoluetly no creases or dents, and the game itself is unplayed. English translation provided. Shipping within the US via insured priority mail. Note to International (non-US) buyers: I must declare actual value on all customs forms. **I will not falsify values on customs forms, no exceptions!**. For International orders, only Paypal is accepted.

Contents: - Game board - 15 tide cards (plus 1 blank card) - 84 metal pieces (motherships, turrets, crabs, converters, tanks, super tanks, patrol boats, barges, pontoon bridges) - Colored plastic markers (for determining ownership of playing pieces) - 9 wooden cubes - 100+ ore pieces The game comes with the portuguese translation of the rules, not the french rulebook. It still has the original factory wrap, and was opened only once (10 or so years ago), by the distributors, to put the portuguese rulebook into the box. Otherwise the game is completely new, and has never been played.
Paypal payment only. Shipping for Europe: €11 USA: €21 Feel free to contact me for any further information.

Original boardgame from Ludodélere(1988 first edition), it is in a very good condition, only very minor wears, complete, but only with German rules, i don´t know, but i believe, i had never French rules for this game, but i also never miss them! :) This is really a treasure for collectors, and i know it is more worth than i want!

This is the French edition with French rules and cards (English rules are available here on BGG and there only a few types of cards for the tides). Complete and in very good condition. Played a few times with some minor shelf wear to the box top. Pics available on request.

This is the French edition with French rules.(English rules are available here on BGG and there only a few types of cards for the tides). Good - Minor damage to the box and/or its contents. The Holy Grail of board game collecting...very rare! The game is complete and in very good condition; however, the box has considerable shelf wear and at least one split corner.
Still in its original shrink! Perfect condition, box and all. Never opened.
Little shelf wear on bottom and top of the box. Game has never bin played with. The game components are in perfect condition ! Any questions just ask.

This copy is BRAND NEW still in its original shrink, most probably one of the last copies on earth, making this the ultimate collector item, the holy grail for every gamer. One of the small sides of the box was slightly damaged (barely noticeable, you should not worry about this), game is otherwise absolutely new as if you had bought it ten minutes ago at the local store !!! Recomended shipping method for this jewel is airmail + insurance and tracking number. Due to its weight this will cost about 40 Euro ($50). Cheaper shipping available, but slower and without insurance. Payment in Euro preferred for this item but if you really want to pay with US dollars, an agreement can certainly be found.

Complete. Comes with both English and French rules. Box shows shelf wear, but components are all in excellent condition. Original rocks and color chips, as well as a small bag of metallic beads to use instead of placing the real rocks on the gameboard.
Tip Top Condition. Box Excellent. Game Board Super Good English Rules.

I was a boardgame collector in the Eighties, but have not played in the last fifteen years. I never bought used items, I only bought them new in the shop. I have played FULL METAL PLANET a few times (20-30) in the Eighties, but was very very carefully. All items are still included, there are even much more coloured markers and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;stones_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. The board is MINT as are the rulebook and the rest. A copy of German rules (translated) is also included. The only signs of the age are some small white lines at the edges of the box (front and rear), but a game in the shop will this get after a while too. Shipping: Germany 6 Euro. EU in Europe: 17 Euro. Rest of Europe: 30 Euro. USA, Canada: 35 Euro. Rest of the World: 40 Euro. International Paying per PayPal, in Europe and Germany bank transfer too - auch per Überweisung. Perfekt erhaltene Ausgabe von FULL METAL PLANET mit allen Bestandteilen plus deutscher Übersetzung der Regeln. Wurde von mir damals neu im Laden gekauft und selbst beim Spielen wie ein rohes Ei behandelt. Spielbrett deshalb nch immer in Top-Zustand!!! Box sehr gut erhalten, aber altersbedingt schmale weiße _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Blitzkanten_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; an den Rändern. Sonst alles, als wäre es eben NEU gekauft worden!

*Reserved for Bruce* This is a one-of-a-kind edition of this game. I bought it new, it includes the expansion and it is new, and it is in a custom-made wood box with a lid that is a shiny surface with the image of the game box. There is a custom-made wood piece made for the game that I am sure I would know what it is if I had ever played the game. The game has never been played. When I bought it, my kids were too young to play it. Nobody ever seemed interested, and now it is just my husband and me playing games. In my opinion, this game needs more than 2-players. The wooden box measures approximately 21_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; by 13 1/2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; by 4_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. There are individual compartments with wood dividers. Comes from a smoke-free home.
